name: AudioFileResource.LoadingStrategy
desc: Strategies that the playback controller can use to access a resourceâ€™s data during playback.

items.name: case preload
items.desc: Load and decode all the data into memory before playback.

items.name: case stream
items.desc: Stream data from disk, decoding in real time.

items.name: static func == (AudioFileResource.LoadingStrategy, AudioFileResource.LoadingStrategy) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two load strategies are equal.

items.name: static func != (AudioFileResource.LoadingStrategy, AudioFileResource.LoadingStrategy) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two load strategies are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the load strategy by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the load strategy.
